channel.title: Another SMF easter egg
channel.description:
Well casey mentioned about him and Ikiliki having a post count battle, so I upped his post count from 3866 to 100866, and I didn't expect it, but I found another SMF easter egg to do with post count(remember that 1337 one, the post count showed up as leet), and here it is:
[img]http://img247.imageshack.us/img247/5075/caseyzv5.png[/img]
[b]EDIT:[/b] post count was put back to normal after taking the screenshot. Inb4 "omg foul play!"

item.title: Another SMF easter egg
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“nator123123, post:3, topic:187133”]coooooool.
How much post count do you need, exactly?[/quote]

At least 100,001.

Cruzer:

And if you set your ICQ number to 1337 is displays 1337. Look under my name.

Nice find, lol.

Read full topic
